alert.note: Alert for Outagamie; Shawano; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 30 at 11:06AM CDT until May 01 at 4:48PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wolf River near Shiocton affecting Outagamie, Shawano and Waupaca Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Wolf River near Shiocton. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, There is minor flooding in the Shiocton area including the city park and boat landing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 AM CDT Sunday was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 9.7 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.2 feet on 09/30/2010. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight.
